name: Teriyaki Chicken
description: Glossy, sweet and savory teriyaki glazed chicken served with fresh vegetables and steamed rice.

instructions.instruction: Mix soy sauce, mirin, rice vinegar, honey, garlic, and ginger for teriyaki sauce.
Dissolve cornstarch in water, add to sauce mixture.
Cut chicken thighs into smaller pieces if large.
Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook until golden brown on bottom, 5-6 minutes.
instructions.tip: Don't touch - let it develop nice crust.

instructions.instruction: Flip and cook other side 5 minutes.
Pour prepared teriyaki sauce over chicken.
Reduce heat, cook until sauce thickens and coats chicken, 5-7 minutes.
instructions.tip: Turn chicken several times to coat with glaze.

instructions.instruction: Drizzle remaining sauce, garnish with sesame seeds and green onions.

tips: No mirin? Use 2 tbsp white wine + 1 tbsp sugar.
Chicken breast works but thighs stay juicier.
Use low-sodium soy sauce for healthier version.
storageInfo: Refrigerate up to 3 days. Add splash of water when reheating to maintain moisture.
servingSuggestion: Serve over jasmine rice with steamed vegetables.
variations: Salmon: Use salmon fillet instead of chicken.
Tofu: Use pressed tofu for vegan version.
